► The headway between each train on Weekdays (Monday to Friday) will be 3½ minutes at peak hours and 8 minutes at non-peak hours. 
The headway between each train on Saturdays during peak hours will be around 5 to 6 minutes. 
The headway between each train on Sundays or Public Holidays will be 8 minutes. 
 
 ► The 1st train* will leave from Versova at 05:20 hrs and Ghatkopar at 05:29 hrs. 
 
 ► The last train* from Versova will leave at 23:20 hrs. The last train from Ghatkopar will leave at 23:46 hrs. 
 
 ► Subject to change from time to time, please contact Customer Care at station for an update on the same.
